p: In the present work, a simultaneous analysis of seventeen compounds, namely gallic acid, neochlorogenic acid, caffeic acid, p-coumaric acid, trans-ferulic acid, (+)-catechin hydrate, (−)-epicatechin, procyanidin A2, procyanidin B2, rutin, quercetin-3- d-galactoside, kaempferol-3-glucoside, kaempferol, quercetin, ursolic and oleanolic acids, in four different species of the Cucurbitaceae family cultivated in Romania, namely Momordica charantia, Cucumis metuliferus, Benincasa hispida and Trichosanthes cucumerina was achieved by HPLC-DAD. The quantitative data (mg kg −1) of the analysed compounds are reported in Table 1.
